original_question: What is the name of the unofficial accolade given to passenger liners crossing the Atlantic Ocean in regular service with the record highest speed?
diverse_qns: Can you tell me what the unofficial title is for the fastest passenger liner crossing the Atlantic Ocean?

What's the name given to the passenger liners that hold the record for crossing the Atlantic Ocean at the highest speed?
Which unofficial award is given to the quickest passenger liner to complete a transatlantic journey?

What term is used to describe the passenger liner that has crossed the Atlantic Ocean in record speed?
What do you call the title earned by the fastest ferry-type ship to navigate across the Atlantic Ocean?
Could you tell me the unofficial recognition accorded to the swiftest passenger liner sailing the Atlantic Ocean?
What is the fastest transatlantic passenger liner unofficially referred to as?
What informal honor is given to passenger liners crossing the Atlantic Ocean with the quickest time?
